original_text: and that Jacob had obeyed his father and mother and had gone to Paddan Aram.
korean_text: 또 야곱이 부모의 명을 따라 밧단아람으로 갔으며

sentences.original_text: and that Jacob had obeyed his father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 야곱이 그 아버지와 어머니에게 순종했다는 것과

sentences.original_text: and had gone to Paddan Aram
